features: Advanced Catalytic Decomposition Technology - ♕Decomposes harmful gases into water molecular, eliminates the odors at the source, maintains a fresh odorless refrigerator,and keeps the foods fresh longer.
A Decade-long Service Life with High Efficiency - ♕Serves you for as long as 10 years with no need for any replacement,relieves burdens of the earth by reducing waste.

More Effective Than Baking Soda & Activated Carbon - ♕Just simply put the refrigerator smell eliminator in there, and it'll do the job.No need any power supply, no saturation,no secondary pollution.Fragrance and chemical free.

Made of SUS 304 Stainless Steel - ♕Good material makes it a highly wrought,stylish,and durable odor absorber in refrigerator and freezer. Compact size makes it a potable deodorizer odor eliminator for small spaces like drawers,shoe cabinet,storage compartment,cars,gymbags,travel suitcases.
Thoughtful Gift for Friends and Family - ♕Giving this exquisite and warm gift is an unique way to show your care about someone's health.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose Purriko Refrigerator Odor Absorber? LONG LASTING：A 10-year lifespan starting from unsealing the packaging.ZERO CONSUMABLES: Filtering core and SUS 304 stainless steel shell can last for a decade and no replacements required.POWERFUL AND EFFECTIVE：Nano-scale catalysts decompose TVOC and other organic harmful gases effeciently.CONVENIENT AND EASY TO USE: With Purriko Fridge Smell Eliminator, you don't need to recharge or reactivate it ,or to deal with the mess of spilled baking soda in your fridge every now and then,just put it in smelly spaces and it will do it's job. Once and for all.
Unique,Powerful,and Elegant. An unique fridge purifier combining the present-day technology with a stunning look which keeps the odors away in an elegant way.
SUS 304 Food Grade Shell Made of SUS 304 food grade stainless steel which is durable, non-toxic, rust-proof,and easy to keep clean inside the fridge.

What's inside that removes the smell like magic? The CH-cut filter equipped with advanced decomposition particles efficiently decomposes the harmful gases . The Air Guided Ring with a 360° Airduct Design enables the air go in and out more smoothly. They work together with the SUS304 stainless steel shell to provide you a 10-year long, highly effective fridge deodorizer.

Recommended Usage: One is recommended for every 18ft3(0.5m³) ,which is the internal space volume of a standard sized fride.For fridge with large capacity, usually stores some foods that produce strong smells,or other spaces like vehicles,closet,wardrobe,etc,2 per cube is advised to achieve a better and quicker odor-eliminating effect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This odor eliminator really does work. I had a car filled with smoke smell, and after several applications of baking soda, vacuuming it up, cleaning all surfaces (inside of windows, under seats, all floor mats) the smoke smell still lingered. I tried a spraycan odor eliminator from Amazon, and the stink from it was AWFUL. I want no smell, not an awful smell that would mask the smoke smell. Then I tried this odor eliminator, and finally, something works! It really works! It is better than 10 boxes of baking soda, AND it will last 10 years! Amazing product, and very happy I found it. My car no longer smells (no smoke smell, and no nasty spraycan smell either).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a must for anyone who food preps. If you prep for the week you know your refrigerator can sometime take on the smell of all the foods you have cooked. This little thing takes all the smells away. It’s amazing. A must!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small and mighty
reviews.reviewText: Was looking for something for my RV refrigerator for the days we use it and the weeks we don't. I was worried about it being an overpriced gadget that didn't work well. To my surprise, it seems to be working fine for now, looking forward to the next couple of years. I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skeptical, BUT it WORKS!
reviews.reviewText: I was hesitant to spend a lot of money on these, but I bought 2, one for my fridge and one for my freezer. My freezer smelled stale and just off. In three days, all odors were gone. My husband absconded with the second one for his closest and told me he was thrilled how it worked within a week to clear the smell. So I ended up purchasing a 3rd one for the fridge. The stainless steel look is unobtrusive and looks a whole lot better than an open box of baking soda. Worth every penny!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really thought I was taking part in a giant hustle, but I was desperate. There was a mystery smell in my refrigerator that would not go away no matter how many times I scrubbed it and it was making me crazy. I finally ordered this and in less than 24 hours the smell is completely gone. I don't know how or why it works and I don't even care, but I can assure you somehow it does. Some people say it doesn't last more than a year, but I am more than happy if I get a year out of this and feel that it's more than worth the money. If I don't get more than a month or two out of it, I still feel it is worth the money. No amount of white vinegar, baking soda, or cleaning helped. This did!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not last more than a year
reviews.reviewText: Great looking item and great size. Worked once I received but sadly has stopped working completely. The 10 years is definitely not accurate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far FRESH!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve purchased baking soda for years to keep my fridge fresh - found this product and decided to give it a try. I’ve had it for almost 2 months and it works great. No weird smells! Fresh as the day I put it in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It really does work!
reviews.reviewText: We had a head of lettuce go bad in our fridge. We put new boxes of baking soda in both the fridge and the freezer areas, but it still stunk after a week. Made the Ice taste bad too. Put this in the fridge area, and in about 8-10 days the odor was gone from the fridge. Still a bit left in the freezer, but it is gradually going away too. I don't know what's in this little guy, but whatever it is, it works.
Excelente compra, usaba bicarbonato en el refrigerador, y ya no ocupo más, este producto realmente elimina los olores del refrigerador ! Excelente compra !
Very happy with my purchase, result is better than expected.
So far after using for 1 month or so, it's a great product that works.
Si funciona bienNo hay olores de verduras, salsas etc en el refrigerador.
